Title: Another Life
Writer: Umberto Contarello (story & screenplay), Francesco Piccolo (story & screenplay), Michele Placido (story & screenplay), Domenico Starnone (story & screenplay)
Actors: Stefano Accorsi, Barbora Bobulova, Violante Placido, Stefano Dionisi
Plot: A young couple, Matteo and Emma, work in a hospital. He is working in the ambulance and she is a surgeon. In one night, their lives will change.
